### gocreate

---
### Features
- Structuring Go Applications

#### How to use gocreate?
Download the latest gocreate binary
```
go get -v github.com/complexorganizations/gocreate
```
Create a project using `gocreate`
```
gocreate PROJECT_NAME
```
